title: This Cool iPhone Gadget
description: Video you may have missed -   Kenu Stance iPhone Accessory -   Here's a cool accessory for the iPhone 6s (or any iPhone featuring the lightning port). This little guy acts as a quick table top tripod or stand and it's even got a bottle opener. This quickly became one of my favorite inexpensive iPhone accessories.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -

It even got a bottle opener in it Because you might get thirsty...
